ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: An animal has died! Healthy animals are an essential part of a successful zoo. Due to this unfortunate circumstance it is impossible for you to achieve your goals.
Waltham Animal Park Redevelopment Plan
Waltham Animal Park Redevelopment Successful!

MSPA officials have found conditions in the Waltham Animal Park to be in violation of animal welfare standards. Exhibits are filthy, animals are underfed and in environments not completely suited to their needs, and trash litters the public common areas. They have mandated that the park be closed.
The Blue Fang Development Fund has acquired $5000 to contribute to the redevelopment and future growth of the site. MSPA concedes that improving conditions is in the best interests of the animals and has given you the following agenda. Hire maintenance staff to clean the park and zookeepers to address the exhibits. Ensure that the basic needs of the animals currently in the park are met. Once you have achieved these objectives, MSPA will review your efforts.

MSPA officials have found conditions in the Waltham Animal Park to be in violation of animal welfare standards. Use the funds from the Blue Fang Development Fund to take the park from a dilapidated facility to a successful venture!
Hire at least 2 Maintenance Workers and empty your trash cans.
Great! The trash has been cleaned up.
Hire at least 2 Zookeepers and clean the unsanitary exhibits.
Great! The exhibits have been cleaned up.
Meet the basic needs of the animals in your park.
Excellent! All of the animals are receiving excellent basic care.
Waltham Animal Park Growth Phase Successful!

MSPA officials are pleased with your progress on the cleanup effort and have lifted the restrictions on opening the park. You can now open your park to the public and begin earning park revenue to supplement the redevelopment effort. Enhance the existing exhibits to be more visually appealing to the guests and place donation boxes to collect revenue.
MSPA officials have also granted permission to create one new exhibit to allow them to judge your abilities to grow the park. Create a new animal exhibit to help increase park popularity and demonstrate that you can adequately care for the animal by meeting the advanced privacy needs of all your animals. Purchasing appropriate shelters will help the animals' attempts to meet their privacy need. The Blue Fang Development Fund has acquired an additional $5000 to aid you in your effort.
Place 3 donation boxes to collect revenue.
Great! Your donation boxes will allow guests to donate funds.
Adopt one new animal so that you have six animals in your park.
Your new animal should draw in additional guests!
Meet the privacy needs of all animals in your park.
Your animals have been able to satisfy their need for privacy.
MSPA officials are satisfied that animal welfare is now under control. All restrictions on the Waltham Animal Park have now been lifted and you have been given the Bronze Seal for Park Redevelopment.

MSPA officials are distressed over the recent death of an animal at the Waltham Animal Park. They are reevaluating their position as to the viability of the park. The remaining animals have been transferred to other facilities.
MSPA officials are distressed over the recent death of an animal. The remaining animals have been transferred to other facilities.
Raintree Cooperative Animal Park
Raintree Cooperative Animal Park Enhancement Successful!

Word of the Blue Fang Development Fund has spread and administrators have been notified of a facility in severe need of help. The Raintree Cooperative Animal Park is a new facility with the best intentions. Unfortunately their zoo planners did not understand their animals' requirements. Exhibits are cramped and unsuitable for the animals' habitat needs. You have been granted $5000 to improve the exhibit conditions for the animals at the park.
The zoo has been closed due to the poor condition of the exhibits. You may open it at any time should you require additional funds however guests do not enjoy viewing unhappy animals. No new animals may be added to the park until the environment is made suitable for the exisitng animals.

The Blue Fang Development Fund has learned of a facility in severe need of help! Use the funds available to improve the conditions for the animals at the park and create a prosperous environment for future growth.
Satisfy the environment need for all animals.
Great! The animals are now in exhibits appropriate to their space and biome requirements.

The Raintree Cooperative Animal Park is grateful for your help. Using what they have learned from your actions, they will continue to evolve their facility with the understanding that space and environment are important parts of animal care.
Wolverton Animal Rehabilitation Center
Wolverton Animal Rehabilitation Center Quarantine Complete

An expert panel has criticized your park's handling of animals, citing several critical illnesses experienced by animals in your facility. As a result of this unwanted attention, all of your zookeepers have quit! You must hire new zookeepers and restore your animals to good health before things get even more out of control.
At the moment, hunger and illness run rampant through the facility. Although the Blue Fang Development Fund has been able to contribute $2500 towards your efforts, your funds remain limited as there was no allowance in your annual budget for this sort of emergency. You need to continue to generate admissions income to be able to hire a sufficient staff. As guests do not enjoy seeing ill animals, it is recommended that you build a quarantine area to isolate the ill animals.
Restore your animals to good condition so that a press conference can put to rest the rumors circulating about your facility.
Illness runs rampant at the Wolverton Animal Rehabilitation Center and funds are at an all time low. Restore good health to the facility to eliminate the bad press surrounding the animals' illnesses.
Animals are starving! Ensure that their hunger needs are satisfied.
Excellent! Your animals' hunger needs have been satisfied.
Animals are sick! Treat all animals' illnesses.
Illness has been eliminated from your facility!

Now that the animals have been fed and are no longer exhibiting signs of illness, a private invitation has been sent to critics inviting them to revisit the facility. Maintain your high standards and increase your zoo fame level to 3 stars.
Increase your zoo fame to 3 stars.
Your zoo fame has increased to at least 3 stars!
The results are even better than you had hoped. The critics have issued a full retraction of their previous statement about the facility.
Waltham Animal Park Redevelopment Effort
Troubled Zoos
Raintree Cooperative Animal Park
Cramped Quarters
Wolverton Animal Rehabilitation Center
Quarantine

Baby Tiger Successful!
Adopt a female tiger!
You have adopted a female tiger!
Adopt a female tiger
You must meet your tiger advanced needs
You have met your tiger advanced needs!
You must breed a baby tiger
You have bred a baby tiger!
You must satisfy your baby tiger basic needs
You have satisfied the needs of your baby tiger!
